sentences.en: a group of seventeen American military officers
sentences.cn: 由17名美国军官组成的团体

sentences.en: At the tender age of seventeen I left home.
sentences.cn: 早在十七岁的小小年纪,我就离开了家.

sentences.en: City's principal marksman was Joe Harvey who scored seventeen goals.
sentences.cn: 市队的头号射手是打进17粒进球的乔·哈维。

sentences.en: He was only seventeen when he joined the army.
I got it on seventeen days approval, so if you don't like it we can change it.
sentences.cn: 我买这件东西可试用17天, 所以你要是不喜欢我们可以拿去调换.

sentences.en: I left home when I was seventeen (= 17 years old ) .
I'd jumped seventeen feet six in the long jump, which was a school record.
sentences.cn: 我跳远曾经跳出了17.6英尺，创造了学校纪录。

sentences.en: In an unprecedented action, the army, on its own initiative, arrested seventeen civilians.
sentences.cn: 军队竟然擅自逮捕了17个平民, 这种行为简直是前所未有.

sentences.en: Nora thought he was seventeen years old.
Normally it has only had eleven or twelve members in all. Now it will have seventeen at the very least.
sentences.cn: 通常总共只有十一二个会员。现在将至少有十七个。

sentences.en: Seventeen congressmen were absent at the Congressional roll call.
sentences.cn: 议会点名时有17名议员缺席.

sentences.en: Seventeen publishers rejected the manuscript before Jenks saw its potential.
sentences.cn: 17家出版社回绝了这部手稿，直到詹克斯看到了它的潜在价值。

sentences.en: Seventeen thousand Indians live in Arizona on a reservation.
sentences.cn: 1.7万印第安人生活在亚利桑那州的保留地。

sentences.en: The collection has been built up over the last seventeen years.
sentences.cn: 在过去的17年中，收藏的规模不断扩大。

sentences.en: The role is played by seventeen-year-old Briton Jane March.
sentences.cn: 这个角色由17岁的英国人简·马奇扮演。

sentences.en: There was a firm rubric in the book about what had to be observed when interrogating anyone under seventeen.
sentences.cn: 书中严格规定了审讯17岁以下未成年人时应当遵守的事项。

words.tran_cn: 第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的

trans.tran_cn: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的
